attributes.action: make council tax for pensioners proportionate to M.P.s' salaries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the income for a pensioner's household is (say) £15,000 and an M.P.'s is £60,000 then make the  pensioner's council tax proportional to the ratio, i.e. 25% of rhe local council tax of (say) £2,000, giving a tax take of £500 p.a.
This is far more equitable, and yet simple!
